website_summaries.verdict: A versatile, lightweight, brightly colored life jacket that is good for learning to swim, snorkeling, and other water sports.
pros: This durable life jacket is made of high-quality, tear-resistant nylon
Can be fully inflated by mouth in just 15 seconds
Comes with a waist strap and a crotch strap to provide an exceptional fit
As an added precaution, this jacket also comes with an emergency whistle
cons: Has an upper weight limit of just 220 pounds

customer_reviews.title: Delighted with the highly visible buoyancy vest
customer_reviews.text: Delighted with the buoyancy vest, value for money, it does what it's meant for summer to do! Longevity I cannot tell you, however for the first time usage, I'm pleased and look forward to getting my snorkel gear back and truly testing the vest. However, for standard holiday snorkel usage I'd say it's great and will do its summer job! The best, it it has excellent visibility which we know is vital when out in the waters, especially with the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Clarita PinkTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not USCG approved.
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT USCG approved like it says in the description. It says on vest do not depend on it to save your life. Got 2 to go kayaking at the beach. Now I'll buy 2 that are actually USCG approved. However seems like good quality. I guess I'll also buy 2 snorkeling masks now. I'll keep them for snorkeling.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Miami

customer_reviews.title: I'm not a good swimmer. The vest gave me the buoyancy and ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a good swimmer. The vest gave me the buoyancy and confidence to relax and enjoy snorkeling. Wish I'd found it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Snorkeling in Hawaii
customer_reviews.text: We use these vests for snorkeling in Hawaii this week. They worked great! We like how they fold up nice and neat when we're finished and they actually fit in our snorkel gear bag. Satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.author: G. Elder

customer_reviews.title: It does exactly what we expect!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lifejacket for snorkeling, we use it during snorkeling and it works perfectly. It keeps us floating all the time so we can enjoy the beauty of coral reef without worrying about keeping balance in the water! Super easy to add/remove air. Also due to the small size after extract all air, it's very easy to put them into suitcase while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: kingofworld

customer_reviews.title: Average Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is less of a dive vest and more of a cheap life preserver you would find under your seat on an airplane. Really didn’t like the product. Not very durable and not great funcionality
customer_reviews.author: Diego 454

customer_reviews.title: It's Not a Life Jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 year old granddaughter to wear in our boat. She dont like the big bulky life jackets. But the tag on it says under no circumstance is this to be used as a life jacket. So it's useless! You have to have coast guard approved life jackets on the boat and the way it reads, I don't think it's safe on the sand bar.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Parker

customer_reviews.title: A classic horseshoe design with a touch of quality
customer_reviews.text: X-lounger snorkeling vest is a must-have for every snorkeler and swimmer. It is very easy to inflate and deflate the vest to adjust your desired buoyancy level. It could well be a good "insurance policy" for a strong swimmer; you don't know what would happen out in the open water.
customer_reviews.author: Thurein

customer_reviews.title: easy to blow up
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used yet, bought it for a Mexico trip. Don't want to use the resorts. We have put it on, easy to blow up. Nice and compact. Perfect for our suitcase. Not bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Postcardlady

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine great price
customer_reviews.text: These inflated and deflated perfectly and could be carried flat in our luggage. We used them to snorkel in Grand Cayman at the Cheeseburger and wreck sites that you have to swim to. Worked great and kept us safe.
customer_reviews.author: Skizik

customer_reviews.title: "Momma can snorkel and be color coordinated and cute"
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled to find a vest to match my fins and mask (Red). It arrived quickly and easy to inflate and deflate. We have another couple months till our trip, so I'm not sure how it endures while snorkeling. I'll amend my review after our trip 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: like on a boat out to sea
customer_reviews.text: It did the job. I wouldn't use it as a regular life vest, though; like on a boat out to sea. It isn't durable enough to keep you up for hours. Just a safety measure for kids playing in a lake or a pool with deep water.
customer_reviews.author: wanderingwordeye

customer_reviews.title: Love the size and storage pouch
customer_reviews.text: We have limited space in our small boat and these work perfectly. Inflate in seconds (hopefully never needed) but exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: mjd7

customer_reviews.title: Not a snorkel vest !
customer_reviews.text: The valve cap does not let the air escape, it is not long enough to push the valve in to release the air so not really a snorkel vest. probably ok if you want a life jacket but you could find a better life jacket. Buy one with a push valve that makes it deflate quick
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Used this on Hawaii trip for extra safety while snorkeling. Easy to use and at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Art Von Oz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: We used these on our snorkel trip. Very easy to inflate, simple to put on. Worked great. Very flat and easy to pack. After use we figured out our to deflate and went fast. Would recommend this to anyone needing some extra float power while snorkling!!
customer_reviews.author: jpritts

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something that would be great for having a picnic date on so I decided to try this out. It is inexpensive and the quality of it feels quite durable. It is very easy to clean because it is water resistant. As a bonus, I didn't know it came with these floor spikes that secure it to the ground. It came in handy and I was able to spread it out flat and smoothed out. Although I wish there were more colors, the product gets the job done. Also, I can tell this would be great for camping. Definitely would recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They hold in the air very well and easily inflatable and to deflate
customer_reviews.author: muneca

customer_reviews.title: Easy adjustable floatation
customer_reviews.text: These are an inexpensive way to provide a little confidence to unsure swimmers. They can add as much air as they feel like they need. These are also easy to store flat so they don't take up much space.
customer_reviews.author: Guile

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality. Highly Recommend!! A++
customer_reviews.text: This pocket blanket is such great quality! Honestly the perfect size for anywhere I go -- can fit in my backpack or even my pants pocket. Extremely durable and lightweight. Definitely will be bringing this with me on all of my hikes. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall nice fit.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't put it to the buoyancy test yet, but I like the contour of the fit. Seems to be durable too. Not thin material.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A. White

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for wearing when you do not need a bulky life vest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inflatable lounger jacket
customer_reviews.text: It is a good inflatable lounger jacket, from kids to adult size.
customer_reviews.author: Mila Llorente

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I use this blanket for picnics and camping and it works perfectly! Very durable and convenient to take with you. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Verde

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and really light! It can literally fit in my pocket but I just throw it in my backpack and it takes up no space at all. Also the bag comes with a clip hook so I can just hook it on anything! So convenient and simple. Highly recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Zaxedo

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! I took it to the lake with the kids and it survived the durability test for sure. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is great. So compact ,perfect to go in the backpack
customer_reviews.author: Juliet Hibbs

customer_reviews.title: So- so
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2, one came with mesh storage bag, other one did't.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Guingo

customer_reviews.title: worked great!
customer_reviews.text: This worked really well i bought it for a camping trip and it was very durable and the perfect size
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! It's light, compact, durable, and water resistant. Perfect for my picnic and camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Red is red orangish
customer_reviews.text: Red is orangish but not pink that's good my husband was worried it worked great love it
customer_reviews.author: MzSimplyAmazin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: User this on a recent trip to Grand Cayman and worked as advertised for hours of snorkeling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks to be good quality.
customer_reviews.text: haven't used it yet. It looks to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: To early.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this vest late last week and I got the email to rate it the next day. I have no way I can rate it yet. I don't even plan to use it until early December. It looks good and it fits me, but that is the extent I can say anything about it. I will probably get a chance to test it next week. But to rate it he next day was a little abrupt.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for everything
customer_reviews.text: Received this blanket as a gift. I was blown away by the high quality material it is made of. I've purchased a few others that were made of thin weird plastic, not this one. I love to use it when I go hiking, hammocking, or just in the park. Highly recommend purchasing this blanket over all the others, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Kai J.

customer_reviews.title: This blanket is awesome! I've never heard of something like this until ...
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is awesome! I've never heard of something like this until me friend showed me it. It's durable and easily portable. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Luke W

customer_reviews.title: Works great in Bahamas
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my girlfriend. She is using it in the Bahamas and she said that it was just great.
customer_reviews.author: jimemc

customer_reviews.title: Impeccable quality, amazing design, great for beach days and more!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable product! Used it a few times now in the nice warm weather for beach days. Very high quality item and my family loved it!
customer_reviews.author: SimplyKitchen Customer Service

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a couple of these blankets for my camping trip and these came in so much handy! I was surprised at the durability and quality, and was impressed at how much space it conserved in our bags. would definitely recommend to anyone who loves to be outdoors!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin Pareja

customer_reviews.title: nice quality also
customer_reviews.text: i go hiking a lot so this is perfect for me, happy with the purchase it was cheap too!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: A must have for an outdoor adventure, camping. Makes everything easier and extremely durable. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Melendez

product_meta.title: X-Lounger Inflatable Snorkeling Vest, Snorkel Vest Life Jacket Free Diving Swimming Surfing Safety for Adults Youth
product_meta.description: Features 1. Adjustable longer crotch and waist strap ensure your comfort 2. Easily to inflate by mouth within 15s provide convenience 3. Quick deflate by insert the cap into the air valve save your time 4. Improved cap of inflation tube better to prevent air leaking 5. Life-saving whistle with 3C certification ensure your safety 6. High Quality tear-resistant material make it safe and durable 7. Easy-to-access inflation tube allow you to adjust buoyancy in water 8. Neon colors increase excellent visibility and great for snorkel learner 9. Weight only 9.5oz, equip with 12.6in x 10.5in mesh bag, easy to carry around Application Best Snorkeling companion: For beginner, snorkeling with snorkel vest can give you confidence and ensure your safety. For expert, snorkel jacket can make snorkeling a breeze when you get tired. Excellent swim helper: With X-Lounger inflatable life jacket, you can easily to increase or decrease buoyancy as needed to help you learning swim easier. Other Water Activities: X-Lounger inflatable life jacket also designed to ensure your safety and prevent accidental events when you doing the other water sports. How to Use X-Lounger Snorkeling Vest 1. Loosen the straps 2. Put your head through the hole 3. Buckle up your waist straps and crotch straps 4. Open the inflation tube and inflate it by mouth and then close it 5. Turn the cap upside-down and insert it into inflation tube to deflate 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed All our products deserve a 60 DAYS NO-QUESTION-ASK RETURN OR REPLACE service. Please contact us by email if you have any problem. Related Product 2017 New Foldable Full Face Snorkel Mask
feature_bullets: High Quality Tear-resistant Nylon with TPU Membrane

【LENGTHEN STRAPS & STRENGTHEN AIR TIGHTNESS】Offer longer and adjustable 5. 6-foot crotch and 3. 8-foot belts to offers maximum comfort. By improves the cap of the vent tube to make it perform better and prevent leakage to ensure your safe

【FAST INFLATE & EASY TO DEFLATE】 Quick inflate the life jacket by mouth within 15seconds. Eaily deflate it by turn the cap upside-down and insert it into the air valve. It is convenience to adjust buoyancy in the water even while you're wearing

【HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL & LIFE-SAVING WHISTLE】Outer layer of nylon material, the composite story strength TPU membrane can withstand less than 180lb Load. Equip with life-saving whistle for emergency situation and Conspicuous fluorescent color

【OVER-THE-NECK DESIGN SPECIAL FOR SNORKELING】 Different form regular life jacket, X-lounger vest over-the-neck design keep your head above water when you backstroke but allow you to swim smoothly with your head in the water when you snorkeling.

【PORTABLE & APPLICATION】 Weight only 9. 5oz, equip with mesh bag, easy to carry around. X-Lounger inflatable life jacket is universal size suitable for adults and youth. X-Lounger inflatable life vest passed CE certification to ensure your safety
